description: This file is a Python script that initializes a knowledge base with CSV documents, applies metadata filters, and performs a query using an agent with specific filters.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing a connection to a LanceDB vector database.

classes.name: CSVKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing a knowledge base backed by CSV data and vector embeddings.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class that performs queries on the knowledge base with optional filters.

methods.name: load_document
methods.description: Loads a CSV document into the knowledge base with associated metadata.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response from the agent's query, optionally formatted as markdown.
